sources.title: A Chapter In Her Life
sources.description: Jewel stays with her grizzled, angry grandfather while her parents are overseas on business. Family squabbling is brought to heel through love and understanding from Jewel's pure love for others and trust in Divine Love.

metadata.Plot: Rich but unhappy Mr. Everingham resents the presence in his home of Madge, his widowed daughter-in-law, and her daughter, Eloise. However, Jewel, Everingham's younger son's daughter, arrives for a visit and brings cheer and harmony to the household.
metadata.Writer: Clara Louise Burnham, Doris Schroeder, Lois Weber
metadata.Actors: Claude Gillingwater, Jane Mercer, Jacqueline Gadsdon
